summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of Steve Fallis. The documents primarily consist of payroll records and notifications from the Assassination Records Review Board (ARRB) regarding the postponement of releasing certain information, specifically Social Security numbers, from the payroll records of various HSCA (House Select Committee on Assassinations) staff members. These documents focus on protecting the personal privacy of individuals such as Anne Paul Wilander, Cecelia T. Morton, Paul A. Zevnik, Sari Mordana, Margo E. Jackson, Nancy P. Schultz, and Judith R. Burford. The ARRB notifications detail the reasons for postponing the release of Social Security numbers and the decision to redact this information.
significance: Based on the provided documents, Steve Fallis has no significance in the JFK context as they are not mentioned in any of the documents.
